name: The Dragon Queen
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D old-school RPG in the vein of Last Heroes and Midnight's Blessing.

Enola has lived her own life on a small village secluded from the rest of the world. With an adventurous spirit, she tries her best to find trouble in an otherwise uneventful life. Unaware of her own history, she is curious about others and their stories. The answers she looks for are to be found in the way she always dreamed of, exploring all four corners of the world. What she never expected was the truths those answers would bring forth.

FEATURES


  • A vast world to explore, spawning into forests, deserts, caves, mountains, snowy locations and more
  • A classical storyline that pays homage to the great classics of the genre
  • Sidequests to complete
  • A dragon to fly
  • Up to 15 to 20 hours of gameplay
  • Mouse support
  • Quest journal to track your objectives
